name: Google Chrome
description: The world's most popular web browser. Chrome offers speed, security, and seamless sync across all your devices.
longDescription: Google Chrome is the most widely used web browser, known for its speed, security, and developer tools. On Linux, Chrome provides the same experience you know from other platforms, including sync across devices, extension support, and built-in PDF viewing. OmniSet installs Chrome from Google's official repository, ensuring you always have the latest secure version.

seo.title: Install Chrome on Linux with OmniSet
seo.description: Install Google Chrome on Linux with OmniSet. Get the world's most popular browser set up with one command. Sync your bookmarks, passwords, and extensions.
